item.title: Blockchain 101
item.description: This is a really good explanation about Blockchain. It really helped me to understand concepts that I’ve read before but couldn’t grasp like block and chain validation, how immutability is guaranteed and so on. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_160oMzblY8

Hi there ðŸ‘‹ I’m Herson Oliveira, I’m a software engineer from Brazil ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡· and currently living in Hungary ðŸ‡­ðŸ‡º I created this blog to post things I’ve learned during my work or side projects. You can reach me out on Linkedin, GitHub or email!
